item.title: Ship Products You Are Proud Of
item.author: brandontreb@gmail.com
item.description: There is a familiar phrase that I hear all too often when a client comes to me with an existing application. It goes something like this: “Our team spent quite a bit of money on our application and we don’t want to ship it. We are not proud of the product.” It blows my mind that many developers and development teams are still in business given the poor quality of products that I see getting churned out all of the time.
